original_text: Also offer one male goat as a sin offering. Give these gifts as well as the burnt offering, the grain offerings and the drink offerings that you give each day and each month.
korean_text: 속죄제와 상번제와 그 소제와 그 전제 외에 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Also offer one male goat as a sin offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 수염소 한 마리를 속죄 제물로 드리십시오.

sentences.original_text: Give these gifts as well as the burnt offering,
the grain offerings and the drink offerings
that you give each day and each month.
